meanings.definition: To compose or write a sonnet.
meanings.sent1: I will sonnetize a poem for my class assignment.
meanings.sent2: She loves to sonnetize about nature and love.
meanings.sent3: Trying to sonnetize a story about robots was quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her words sonnetize the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: He can effortlessly sonnetize his emotions into lyrical verses.

meanings.sent1: The poet decided to sonnetize his free verse into a structured sonnet.
meanings.sent2: They were able to sonnetize the old ballad into a beautiful sonnet.
meanings.sent3: It's like trying to sonnetize a rock song - it just doesn't fit!
meanings.sent4: Her smile sonnetizes his heart, turning it into poetry.
meanings.sent5: The artist managed to sonnetize the chaos of the city into a structured form.
